skills.explanation: The video features experimental dance exercises.
The workshop was led by an accademic and an expert.

culturalDiversity.explanation: We can expect a cultural mix from a group of students.
We can expect a cultural mix from a group of students.

compensation.explanation: The students are participating for various incentives.
The leaders of the workshop are participating under contract.

dissemination.explanation: The video is available on Youtube.

recrutement.explanation: We can expect an informal recrutement procedure for the workshop.
Led by members of the COESO Project.

devices.explanation: Few tools used, dance studio and camera. Pen and paper for Laban notations.

flowOfParticipation.explanation: We can imagine spontaneous conversation occuring in the workshop.
Led by experts, we can also expect goal oriented conversation.

roleDistribution.explanation: The workshop was carried out in a way where the students participated in the research and shared their experiences.
We can also imagine a level of expert discussion.
We can also imagine a c ertain degree of coaching.

conflictProblemSolving.explanation: We can imagine that any problems that arrose were resolved through arrangement.

networkingMethod.explanation: The network is growing with student participation.

networkingQuality.explanation: The network is growing more diverse.

idiomManagement.explanation: A workshop with many participants, we can imagine a degree of polysemic tolerance.
We can imagine jargon having to be translated by the experts.
Many of the participants are in the world of contemporary dance and so use the same terminologies.

knowledgeExchangeOrientation.explanation: The model for the workshops is an egalitarian knowledge exchange.

managementStyle.explanation: We can imagine the leaders of the workshop wishing to propose a supporting management style for the workshop.
The leaders are alos stimualting the students.
The leaders are also in control of proceedings.

divisionOfLabor.explanation: Participants are brought to work on things outside of their skill sets.
The leaders are leading the workshop because of their status on the project.

learningProcess.explanation: An experimental workshop, we can imagine a learning process through trial and error.
The scientif method is also being deployed.

legalEthicalCompliance.explanation: We can assume that in this workshop a certain degree of versatility is required in terms of legal and ethical compliance.
With a large numbe rof participants, we can also assume a certain degree of risk taking.
